EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_Welcome Nurture_Q119.4 - Technical - See Us at a Future Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal invites you to come see for yourself
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Continue your cloud-native journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> and better understand underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/tech-insights]]>; why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native. Learn more by downloading and reading one of our most popular eBooks, Thinking Architecturally <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/thinking-architecturally]]>, by Nathaniel Schutta.
If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> to begin a discussion.
And of course, please stay in touch with the Pivotal team by subscribing to our weekly newsletter <[[https://pivotal.io/newsletter-subscription]]> or meet us at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team © 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/ToAIA000v0000UX20N00CJ0]]>Unsubscribe <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWmpkak16QTFOVGhpTmpNeSIsInQiOiJWT004WEh6MEVjajlvZG1zQlRiOXlKbkNvVDdEckZjMGZXQTh1OEhwdlpKNUVKbFhmd29SbTFEcVZGQWpzTzA1XC9reTE3MzJcLzZuWGl2bUpoXC83dncwdz09In0%253D?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]>.
